name: 黃乾怡
objective: This class will review selective subjects (such as definition of reliability, reliability target setting and assurance, design for reliability, reliability tests, etc.) as highlighted in the text book as an initial establishment of the background knowledge. The reliability tests and corresponding conditions for environment-compliant electronics products will then be introduced as special topics. Invited speaker(s) from electronics industry will describe experience in reliability qualification, followed by review of journal papers in the area of reliability engineering and management.
schedule:
Week 1 基本可靠度原理
Week 2 可靠度目標訂定配當與保固
Week 3 系統可靠度模式
Week 4 可靠度設計植入
Week 5-6 可靠度設計分析驗證
Week 7-8可靠度試驗之規劃與執行
Week 9 期中考
Week 10-11國際無鉛產品壽命評估方法（業界講師）
Week 12-13綠色供應鏈可靠度測試方法與條件（業界講師）
Week 14 ~ 18 Journal paper review (oral presentation)
-　　Microelectronics reliability; Quality and reliability engineering international; IEEE transactions on reliability, etc.
-　　Individual
-　　Provide the paper/ppt at least 3 days before presentation and will be posted on the web for all’s access.
-　　Attend for others presentation is mandatory (and ready for QA/discussion)
scorePolicy:
期中考40%
學期報告(Oral presentation) 30%
出席與上課表現30%
materials:
1.　　可靠度保證-工程與管理技術之應用 柯煇耀編著 第四版
2.　　Quality Control by Dale H. Besterfield (8th edition) – Chapter 11 Reliability
3.　　綠色供應鏈可靠度測試方法與條件、國際無鉛產品壽命評估方法 - 工業技術研究院技術報告
4.　　Journal papers - Microelectronics reliability; Quality and reliability engineering international; IEEE transactions on reliability, etc
